prompt.content: Using the cumulative total return values for Meta platforms, Inc. (META) shown in the chart of the 10-k report, calculate the total percentage-point increase in Meta's return from its lowest point in 2022 to its highest point in 2024. Report your final answer as a single number in percentage points.

rubrics.name: The correct graph was identified from the 10-K document, labelled "Comparison of Five-Year Cumulative Total Return for Meta Platforms, Inc"

messages.content: The correct graph was identified from the 10-K document, labelled "Comparison of Five-Year Cumulative Total Return for Meta Platforms, Inc"

rubrics.name: The Form 10-K presents the stock performance graph as an image without an accompanying numeric table.

messages.content: The Form 10-K presents the stock performance graph as an image without an accompanying numeric table.

rubrics.name: Meta’s cumulative total return value at 12/31/2022 is $60.

messages.content: Meta’s cumulative total return value at 12/31/2022 is $60.

rubrics.name: Meta’s cumulative total return value at 12/31/2024 is $290.

messages.content: Meta’s cumulative total return value at 12/31/2024 is $290.

rubrics.name: Computed percentage-point increase from 12/31/2022 to 12/31/2024 is 290 − 60 = 230 percentage points.

messages.content: Computed percentage-point increase from 12/31/2022 to 12/31/2024 is 290 − 60 = 230 percentage points.
